$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|I wonder... Do Plegia's festivals have
tournaments as well?$k$pThese clothes don't seem like they
would be well suited for battle...$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_Plegia21,Face|Oh, really? I rather like them. They're
light, they breathe... Now, who should
I curse next? Heh heh heh...$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Plegia21,Face|I agree with Tharja. These clothes
are easy to move in, so it's easy for
me to like them! Now, let's go!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_砂漠サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_Plegia21,Face|Hm?! I think I saw Robin just now,
right over there... I have to go check.$k$p$WmMPID_砂漠カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Plegia21,Face|Huh?! Uhh... Hey, the battle isn't over
yet, Tharja! ...Wait!$k$p$Sbs150|
